description: This package is purely a library of useful classes which contains useful Selenium Webdriver related methods of interacting with web browsers when automating web applications. As this library was written strictly for interview DEMOs, it has been developed to intentionally cover automating ONLY within; Google Chrome and Firefox browsers, as well as, limite web elements types. However, the library can, quite easily be extended to cover additional web browsers of your choice {e.g. IE, PhantomJS etc} as well as other generic web element types in HTML. The library also contains other useful classes that can be used to efficiently automate the web application under test}. All Selenium related methods for automating generic browser actions can be accessed via the abstract class: SeleniumBase. Enjoy.
releaseNotes: Updated the name of  the public method to CheckPageIsDisplayedAfterSpecificActionViaPageTitle
summary: This package is purely a library of useful classes which contain Selenium Webdriver related methods of interacting with web browsers {covers only Chrome and Firefox browsers at the moment}
title: Generic Selenium Library That Can Be Used To Automate Web Applications
